entry.title: å‘å¸ƒäº†: Photo storyboard style depicting multiple panels in a 16:9 ratio image. Panel 1: A close-up of an alarm clock showing 8:00. Panel 2: A young, ...
entry.summary: Photo storyboard style depicting multiple panels in a 16:9 ratio image. Panel 1: A close-up of an alarm clock showing 8:00. Panel 2: A young, handsome Chinese man lying in bed with closed eyes, sheets draped over him. Panel 3: The man starting to sit up, his face showing surprise as he hears the alarm. Panel 4: The man sitting upright on the bed, his eyes half-opened, exuding a sense of drowsiness. The panels are arranged in a sequential manner with clear borders between them.

entry.title: The Evil Within 2
entry.summary:
To save his daughter, Detective Sebastian Castellanos returns to a world of nightmares in The Evil Within 2.
Fight for your life inside a terrifying reality using weapons, traps and stealth in this survival horror follow-up from Tango Gameworks.
